_meanings:
{@--2@} [ 
{#ajakaM CAgaM vAti prIRAti; vA-ka#}] <ab>N.</ab> of the
tree {#varvarI#}, of which goats are said to
be very fond.

{@--3@} [{#ajakA#} 
{#ajAgalastanaiva vAti prakASate vA-ka#}] A sacrificial
vessel of wood (of the form of  
{#ajAgala#}) dedicated to Mitra and Varuṇa
({#--vaM#} in this sense) {#mEtrAvaruRapAtraM#}.

{@--4@} A
disease of the pupil of the eye =  
{#ajakAjAta#} <ab>q. v.</ab>

{@--5@} A venomous kind of
vermin ({#ajakA rogaviSezaH, tadvizaM#}).
